meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family, typically with yellow or orange flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the calendulas bloomed brightly under the sun.
meanings.sent2: The calendulas added a pop of color to the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the calendulas, enjoying their nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as a field of calendulas in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The children loved picking calendulas to make colorful bouquets.

meanings.definition: The dried flowers of the calendula plant, used in herbal medicine and cosmetics.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a soothing tea with dried calendulas to help with her cold.
meanings.sent2: The calendulas were carefully dried and stored for future use.
meanings.sent3: The herbalist's shop was filled with the calming scent of dried calendulas.
meanings.sent4: Her skin glowed as if touched by the essence of calendulas.
meanings.sent5: The cosmetic products contained extracts of calendulas for their healing properties.
